# Question / Help Request

Please fill out the template so we can help you faster.

- Title: (short summary of your question)
- Description:
  - What are you trying to accomplish?
  - What SDK method(s) are you calling?
- Environment:
  - Node.js version:
  - SDK version:
  - OS / environment (local / server / serverless):
- Steps to reproduce (minimal code sample):
```ts
// minimal snippet
```
- What did you expect to happen?
- What actually happened (error messages / logs)?
- Additional context (screenshots, request/response payloads â€” remove secrets)
